attributes.action: MPs wages to relate to their consitiuents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pay of the Members of Parliament to be the same as the average income of their consitiuents.That way they will know how hard it is for the people. Also the Government should build apartments for the MPs so they can save on the expenses they give MPs.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
